author: frost1989
title: Beautifully Crafted
review:
Caught my attention the very first time I saw this set, this is the first 2018 technic I bought which amazed by friends around on how pretty this racing yacht can be.

The bright color tone of this set is as striking as it can be, the building experience is simple and easy, although there's not much playable function around, I personally do think that this set is worth the bucks and it do really well to sits on your display shelf which looks eye catching and stunningly beautiful.
